problem_text_cn: 如图,点D是线段AB的中点,C是线段AD的中点,若AB=16cm,则线段CD=cm．()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, point D is the midpoint of line segment AB, and C is the midpoint of line segment AD. If AB = N_0, then line segment CD =. ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:由点D是线段AB的中点,得AD=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×16=8cm,由C是线段AD的中点,得CD=\frac{1}{2}AD=\frac{1}{2}×8=4cm．
raw_comment: 本题考查了两点间的距离,利用了线段的中点分线段相等．
